game.beginning: Our hero, a young adventurer and a descendent of a legendary warrior, wakes up in a small, serene village oblivious of his noble ancestry. He possesses an unusual birthmark; a prophecy bearer.
game.ending: After defeating the ancient evil and forging alliances with various tribes and kingdoms, our hero ascends to the throne. United, their strength defeats the malevolent entity, restoring balance to the world.
game.synopsis: Our hero, upon discovering his noble lineage, embarks on a journey to reclaim his ancestral lands, corrupted by a malevolent entity. He forms alliances with diverse tribes and kingdoms, uncovers powerful artifacts, and masters the forgotten combat techniques. With his newly acquired strength, he faces the ancient evil and restores balance to the world.
game.title: Ancestral Echoes
